import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

<div>
    <Cascader v-for={{ ['large', 'default', 'small', 'mini'] }} 
        size={{ value }}
        data={{ self.get('data') }} 
    />
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';
import './index.styl'; 

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            data: [
                {
                    value: 'beijing',
                    label: '北京',
                    children: [
                        {
                            value: 'haidian',
                            label: '海淀区'
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'chaoyang',
                            label: '朝阳区'
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'fengtai',
                            label: '丰台区'
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    value: 'hunan',
                    label: '湖南',
                    children: [
                        {
                            value: 'changsha',
                            label: '长沙市',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    value: 'yuelu',
                                    label: '岳麓区',
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'yueyang',
                            label: '岳阳市',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    value: 'yueyanglou',
                                    label: '岳阳楼区',
                                },
                                {
                                    value: 'yueyangxian',
                                    label: '岳阳县',
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
    }
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Cascader v-for="(value, key) in ['large', 'default', 'small', 'mini']" 
            :size="value"
            :data="data" 
        />
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

export default {
    components: {
        Cascader
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "data": [
                {
                    "value": "beijing",
                    "label": "北京",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "haidian",
                            "label": "海淀区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "chaoyang",
                            "label": "朝阳区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "fengtai",
                            "label": "丰台区"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "value": "hunan",
                    "label": "湖南",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "changsha",
                            "label": "长沙市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yuelu",
                                    "label": "岳麓区"
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "yueyang",
                            "label": "岳阳市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyanglou",
                                    "label": "岳阳楼区"
                                },
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyangxian",
                                    "label": "岳阳县"
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    },
}
</script>
<style lang="stylus" src="./index.styl"></style>

import React from 'react';
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';
import './index.styl';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            "data": [
                {
                    "value": "beijing",
                    "label": "北京",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "haidian",
                            "label": "海淀区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "chaoyang",
                            "label": "朝阳区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "fengtai",
                            "label": "丰台区"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "value": "hunan",
                    "label": "湖南",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "changsha",
                            "label": "长沙市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yuelu",
                                    "label": "岳麓区"
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "yueyang",
                            "label": "岳阳市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyanglou",
                                    "label": "岳阳楼区"
                                },
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyangxian",
                                    "label": "岳阳县"
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                {['large', 'default', 'small', 'mini'].map((value, key) => {
                    return (
                        <Cascader 
                            size={value}
                            data={this.state.data} 
                        />
                    )
                })}
            </div>
        )
    }
}
